content:
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob

Starts a test failover for a Site Recovery protection entity.

Syntax

Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -ProtectionEntity <ASRProtectionEntity> -Direction <String>
 [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>] [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -ProtectionEntity <ASRProtectionEntity> -Direction <String>
 [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>] [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -VMNetwork <ASRNetwork>
 [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -ProtectionEntity <ASRProtectionEntity> -Direction <String>
 [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>] [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>]
 -AzureVMNetworkId <String> [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -RecoveryPlan <ASRRecoveryPlan> [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -RecoveryPlan <ASRRecoveryPlan> -VMNetwork <ASRNetwork>
 [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -RecoveryPlan <ASRRecoveryPlan> -AzureVMNetworkId <String>
 [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -VMNetwork <ASRNetwork>
 -ReplicationProtectedItem <ASRReplicationProtectedItem> [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -AzureVMNetworkId <String>
 -ReplicationProtectedItem <ASRReplicationProtectedItem> [<CommonParameters>]
Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob -Direction <String> [-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile <String>]
 [-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile <String>] -ReplicationProtectedItem <ASRReplicationProtectedItem>
 [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Start-AzureRmSiteRecoveryTestFailoverJob cmdlet starts test failover of an Azure Site Recovery protection entity or recovery plan. You can check whether the job succeeded by using the Get-AzureRmSiteRecoveryJob cmdlet.

Parameters

-ProtectionEntity

Specifies the Site Recovery protection entity object.

Type:ASRProtectionEntity
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Direction

Specifies the failover direction. The acceptable values for this parameter are:

- PrimaryToRecovery

  • RecoveryToPrimary

Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-DataEncryptionPrimaryCertFile

Specifies the primary certificate file.

Type:String
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-DataEncryptionSecondaryCertFile

Specifies the secondary certificate file.

Type:String
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RecoveryPlan

Specifies a recovery plan object.

Type:ASRRecoveryPlan
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-VMNetwork

Specifies the Site Recovery virtual machine network.

Type:ASRNetwork
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-AzureVMNetworkId

Specifies the Azure virtual network ID.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ReplicationProtectedItem
Type:ASRReplicationProtectedItem
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmSiteRecoveryJob
